mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_chapter (chapterId, chapterName, courseId, createTime, updateTime, reverse1, reverse2) VALUES (#{chapterId}, #{chapterName}, #{courseId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{reverse1}, #{reverse2})
